On the leaked insider tape, Amy Robach says she had the Jeffrey Epstein story three years prior, but her exclusive interview was shelved.  Robach says in the leaked tape there was a lot of pressure from Buckingham Palace.  According to NPR, the famed lawyer Alan Dershowitz also pressured the network to kill the story.
Shortly before the interview was due to air, Harvard emeritus law professor Alan Dershowitz called the network.  He was also one of Epstein's lead defense attorneys.
